attributes.action: publicly support abstaining from national elections until politicians prove themselves not to be unduly swayed by public opinion from one day to the next
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cases of political opportunism abound these days.  It is damaging to politicians, the UK's political systems, and there should be a public campaign to 'out' those politicians of any political persuasion who fall back on such unintelligent tactics.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
